title: Sadie Mirror
description:
The clean lines and transitional look of the Sadie Mirror is an ideal addition to any bedroom. This contemporary piece boasts clean white finish and shimmering features on its wooden frame, showcasing a brilliant sense of style that makes a statement. Attractive while the practical design is easily attached to your dresser. Accented with silver shimmery trim and beveled mirror inlay, this unique addition will add a touch of modern elegance and style to any bedroom.

title: Cargo Dresser
description:
Bold industrial accents exude a funky New York loft vibe that makes an immediate impact to your space. The Cargo Dresser embodies true industrial design with warehouse style. It features a unique shipping container appearance, with gunmetal finish enhancing all design elements. Six storage drawers offer ample space to store your clothing, bedding, or personal stuff. Combining industrial chic with a utilitarian design, the Cargo Dresser adds a lot of energy and character to your room decor.

description:
Classic design with touches of modern aspects makes this Haiden Dresser ideal for any bedroom. The piece offers a rectangular tabletop and six storage drawers for displaying or organizing. It also features a glamorous shimmering silver accent trim that adds richness to design. The drawer handles with the same shimmering silver tie them all together to create a cohesive look. The white finish makes it easy to fit into already existing decor.
